main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed hovering near Harrisville, Michigan on April 3, 1966.
interesting points: The object resembled a large ball with three protrusions illuminated by blinking red lights., The observer noted that the object was approximately the size of a basketball when held at arm's length., The sighting lasted about 30 minutes, during which the object reversed its course and demonstrated rapid movement., Physical evidence was obtained and the observer described a spotlight from the object illuminating a cloud bank., The document is part of Project Blue Book, a historical study by the United States Air Force on UFO sightings.
sighted object: one unidentified aerial object resembling a large ball
witness description: A college student from Alpena, Michigan, described as sincere and not disturbed over the sighting.
